<title level="1" right="Rules">[Diplomatic Relations](/Rules.aspx?ID=1788)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 534</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Diplomatic relations refers to acts of leadership that engage with other nations. In order to begin diplomatic relations with another group, PCs must first successfully [Send a Diplomatic Envoy](/Actions.aspx?ID=1406) to the target group. When they establish diplomatic relations with a group, record the name of that group on the kingdom sheet. Once the PCs have established diplomatic relations with a group, they can use the [Establish Trade Agreement](/Actions.aspx?ID=1376) and [Request Foreign Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=1405) Leadership activities.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Diplomatic Relations
